# Results


## How do suicide rates vary across different age groups, genders, and ethnicities in New York State?





## Has there been a significant change in the rate of suicide or alcohol-related deaths in New York State over the years?
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

death_data <- read.csv("Death_data_NY.csv")
death_data <- death_data %>% 
  filter(Age.Group != "Unknown")

# Group data by year and summarize
annual_summary <- death_data %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarise(Suicide_Total = sum(Suicide.Deaths, na.rm = TRUE),
            Alcohol_Related_Total = sum(Alcohol.Related.Deaths, na.rm = TRUE))

# Plotting both Suicide and Alcohol-Related Deaths Over Years
ggplot() +
  geom_line(data = annual_summary, aes(x = Year, y = Suicide_Total, color = "Suicide Deaths")) +
  geom_line(data = annual_summary, aes(x = Year, y = Alcohol_Related_Total, color = "Alcohol-Related Deaths")) +
  labs(title = "Suicide and Alcohol-Related Deaths in New York State Over the Years",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Total Deaths") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Suicide Deaths" = "blue", "Alcohol-Related Deaths" = "red")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```
